short_description: A stunning Neo-Gothic fairy-tale castle in the western Loire Valley, built in 1854 by Louvre architect Louis Visconti, offering exclusive all-inclusive weddings for up to 120 guests with 50 sleeping on-site across 72 acres of gardens, forest, and lake.
